channel.title: Run.bat help? (resolved)
channel.description:
when trying to run a server i downloaded i am getting this error: "''java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . ."
i am a beginner coder, so i cannot create a server from scratch (hence why i am leeching, and don't know this) and i have never really looked at, or messed with the code for run.bat on any servers i have used before, so i don't know how to fix this, and i don't know how this works or what to put to make the server run, so if you could help me i appreciate it, i will rep++ if you answer my question and it works.
here is the code for the run.bat file: [code]@echo off java -cp bin;lib/*; org.dementhium.RS2Server pause[/code]
i am using google 634 by marcbob

item.title: Run.bat help? (resolved)
item.dc:creator: @pat_can_pk pat can pk
item.description:
@pat_can_pk wrote:

Edit your run.bat and enter this code:

@echo off
@Title Run Client (x64)
@color 0b
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause

For the C:/Program Files part, you’re on your own there, you have to check which Java version and which update you got.

Hope this helped.

Read full topic
